level.heading: Transfers from former boards.
level.text: The personnel, records, property, and unexpended balances of appropriations and other funds which relate primarily to former boards shall be transferred to the boards established by this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 12-261
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.
